name: Harborside Aviation
about: Harborside Aviation is a professional flight school offering training at a higher level, driven by the vast experience and pedigree of its certified instructors. Founded by Jake Flumerfelt, who has extensive experience from Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University and Western Michigan Universityâ€™s College of Aviation, the school adheres to industry standard techniques learned from major aviation universities and 121 airline environments. Training is customized to meet individual goals and schedules, conducted in both classroom and aircraft settings to ensure comprehensive learning and cost efficiency. Harborside Aviation provides a state-of-the-art, friendly, and comfortable atmosphere, ensuring students learn the best and safest way to fly. Excellence, respect, and personalized training define Harborside Aviation.
